Detailed Description

SubSystemManager controls initialization of APOXI sub-systems like Inet. On system power on or down sub-systems will get notifications and initialization requests.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum SubSystemManager::BootSequenceState
 

Enumerator:
c_run_level_1 
c_run_level_3  after initialization of static variables
c_run_level_5  after attaching the applications to the containers
c_run_level_7  in the context of the first starting AppContainer
